output_list.code: function mintToken(address target, uint256 mintedAmount) onlyOwner public { balanceOf[target] += mintedAmount; totalSupply += mintedAmount; emit Transfer(0, this, mintedAmount); emit Transfer(this, target, mintedAmount); }
